&#3906;&#3942;&#3962;&#3938;: [3020] 1 ... .1) rin chen dang po/ ... skya gser/ ... zhal gser/ ... jo gser/ ... rgyan gser/ ... tsha gser/ ... grang gser/ ... gser btso ma/ ... gser btul ma/ ... gser btso sbyangs byed pa/ ... gser gtong ba/ ... gser 'byug pa/ ... gser sil ma/ ... mtho 'dod gnam la gser skas btsugs/ dma' 'bebs thal ba'i dong du lhungs/ ... gser dngul la sogs nor rdzas kyis/ snyan pa'i grags pa nyo mi thub/ ... ming gi rnam grangs la kha dog rgyal po dang/ kha dog chen po/ gang gA skyes/ lcags kyi gtso bo/ lcags mchog  cha shas sbyangs/ mdangs ldan/ mdog ldan/ bum brgya skyes/ me'i sa bon/ tshong 'dus 'grim/ 'tsho ba sgrol byed/ zong mchog  gzi brjid skyes/ 'od byed pa/ yid 'ong/ ri las skyes/ rin chen che/ rin chen mdog bzang/ sa le sbram/ sa'i snying po/ sa'i zla ba/ bsreg bya/ he ma bcas so/ 2) sman du 'gro ba'i rin po che'i rigs shig ste nang gses su dmar ser gnyis mchis/ ro bska/ zhu rjes bsil/ nus pas tshe ring/ rgas pa sra/ dbyig dug sel/ skye rgyun gcod/ ... 2.ming 'ga'i sngon du sbyar nas zhe tshig gam che brjod ston pa/ ... gser zhal/ ... gser snyan/ ... gser skyems/ ... gser lam/ ...
a clan.  Btsan-lha. = ka na ka, sa'i snying po, skye ba rgyun gcod.  JD 40.  SS 397.4.  DG 99.5.  = so na.  YTTM 291.9.  = tsag yug rnam.  YTTM 291.12.
